definitions.definition: ( botany ) Any of several flowering plants , of the genus Viola , including the violets and pansies .

main_definition: ( botany ) Any of several flowering plants , of the genus Viola , including the violets and pansies .

definitions.definition: A stringed instrument of the violin family, somewhat larger than a violin , played under the chin , and having a deeper tone .
A person who plays the viola.
An organ stop having a similar tone.
A 10-string steel-string acoustic guitar , used in Brazilian folk music .
A berimbau viola, the smallest member of the berimbau used in capoeira music.

main_definition: A stringed instrument of the violin family, somewhat larger than a violin , played under the chin , and having a deeper tone .
secondary_definitions: A person who plays the viola.
( music ) An organ stop having a similar tone.
( music ) A 10-string steel-string acoustic guitar , used in Brazilian folk music .
( music ) A berimbau viola, the smallest member of the berimbau used in capoeira music.
